text: Va [sumo, ej sarparastoni zanu mard] agar az ixtilofu cudoi mijoni on du [zanu savhar] ʙim dosted, pas, jak dovar az xonavodai savhar va jak dovar az xonavodai zan [ta'jin kuned va ʙaroi tasmimgiri] ʙifiristed. Agar in du [dovar] qasdi isloh [va osti ʙajni zavcajn] dosta ʙosand, Alloh taolo mijoni on du [zanu savhar] sozgori xohad dod. Be gumon, Alloh taolo donoi ogoh ast
